General.Name: Avicopter PLC
General.Description: Avicopter Plc manufactures and sells helicopters and general aircraft system integration, and machine products in China. It also offers helicopter parts and civil helicopters, as well as aviation subcontracting production and customized services. The company was formerly known as Hafei Aviation Industry Co., Ltd. and changed its name to Avicopter Plc in December 2014. Avicopter Plc was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Beijing, China.
